description.zh-cn: 美国历史上最严重的一次股灾，标志着大萧条的开始。
description.en: The most devastating stock market crash in the history of the United States, marking the beginning of the Great Depression.

description.zh-cn: 美国的中央银行系统。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1929年始于美国，并席卷整个资本主义世界的经济衰退时期。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic depression that took place mostly during the 1930s, beginning in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 指北美地区（含美国和加拿大）在1920年代的十年。此名称源于该时期在经济、社会和文化方面表现出的活力。
description.en: A decade of the 1920s in Western society and Western culture. It was a period of economic prosperity with a distinctive cultural edge in the United States and Europe.

description.zh-cn: 1930年通过的一项美国贸易保护主义法律，提高了超过20,000种进口商品的关税。
description.en: A 1930 protectionist trade law in the United States that raised tariffs on over 20,000 imported goods.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一个主要股票市场指数。
description.en: A major stock market index in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国银行家，曾任摩根银行的署理主席。
description.en: American banker who served as the acting head of J.P. Morgan & Co.

description.zh-cn: 美国银行家，曾任大通国家银行主席。
description.en: American banker, served as the chairman of the Chase National Bank.

description.zh-cn: 美国银行家，曾任纽约全国花旗银行主席。
description.en: American banker, served as the chairman of the National City Bank of New York.

description.zh-cn: 美国金融家，曾任纽约证券交易所副主席。
description.en: American financier who served as vice president of the New York Stock Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市华尔街的证券交易所。
description.en: A stock exchange located on Wall Street in New York City, USA.

description.zh-cn: 美国汽车工业的先驱，通用汽车公司的创始人之一。
description.en: A pioneer of the United States automobile industry, and a co-founder of General Motors.

description.zh-cn: 美国的工业、政治和银行家族，是世界上最强大的家族之一。
description.en: An American industrial, political, and banking family that is one of the most powerful families in the world.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

description.zh-cn: 由美国参议院成立，旨在调查1929年华尔街股灾成因的委员会。
description.en: A commission established by the U.S. Senate to investigate the causes of the Wall Street Crash of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1933年通过的美国法律，将商业银行和投资银行业务分离。
description.en: A 1933 U.S. law that separated commercial and investment banking.

description.zh-cn: 一项证券交易规则，规定只有在证券价格上涨时才能进行卖空。
description.en: A securities trading rule that requires a short sale to be entered at a price that is higher than the previous traded price.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，诺贝尔经济学奖得主，芝加哥经济学派的代表人物。
description.en: American economist who received the 1976 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences, a leader of the Chicago school of economics.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，以其与米尔顿·佛利民合作撰写的《美国货币史》而闻名。
description.en: American economist known for her collaboration with Milton Friedman on 'A Monetary History of the United States'.

en: A Monetary History of the United States

description.zh-cn: 由米尔顿·佛利民和安娜·施瓦茨合著的经济学著作，分析了1867年至1960年间美国的货币历史。
description.en: A book by economists Milton Friedman and Anna Schwartz that analyzes the monetary history of the United States from 1867 to 1960.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，联邦储备系统的过度投资是导致1929年华尔街股灾的原因之一。
description.en: According to the information, over-investment by the Federal Reserve System was one of the causes of the Wall Street Crash of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1929年华尔街股灾标志着美国及全球广泛地区步入持久的大萧条。
description.en: The Wall Street Crash of 1929 marked the beginning of the long-lasting Great Depression in the United States and across the world.

description.zh-cn: 1929年的股灾将“咆哮的二十年代”的经济繁荣时期划上句号。
description.en: The stock market crash of 1929 brought the prosperous era of the Roaring Twenties to an end.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家裘德·万尼斯基认为，股灾前市场的剧烈波动与美国国会当时正辩论《斯姆特-霍利关税法案》有关。
description.en: Economist Jude Wanniski suggested that the market volatility before the crash was related to the ongoing congressional debate over the Smoot-Hawley Tariff Act.

description.zh-cn: 股灾导致道琼斯工业平均指数暴跌，至1932年7月8日跌至20世纪的最低点，由最高点计蒸发掉89%。
description.en: The crash caused the Dow Jones Industrial Average to plummet, reaching its 20th-century low on July 8, 1932, an 89% loss from its peak.

description.zh-cn: 与其他主要银行家开会商讨办法，试图消除股市连跌引起的公众恐慌。
description.en: Met with other major bankers to devise a plan to quell the public panic caused by the stock market's continuous decline.

description.zh-cn: 与其他主要银行家开会商讨办法，试图消除股市连跌引起的公众恐慌。
description.en: Met with other major bankers to devise a plan to quell the public panic caused by the stock market's continuous decline.

description.zh-cn: 与其他主要银行家开会商讨办法，试图消除股市连跌引起的公众恐慌。
description.en: Met with other major bankers to devise a plan to quell the public panic caused by the stock market's continuous decline.

description.zh-cn: 在银行家的支持下，代表他们入市购买蓝筹股，成功暂时遏止了当天股市的进一步跌势。
description.en: With the backing of bankers, he entered the market to buy blue-chip stocks, successfully halting the market's further decline for the day.

description.zh-cn: 与其他商界巨富高调大手入市，企图稳住公众对市场的信心，但未能成功。
description.en: Along with other business magnates, made large, high-profile stock purchases in an unsuccessful attempt to stabilize public confidence in the market.

description.zh-cn: 与其他商界巨富高调大手入市，企图稳住公众对市场的信心，但未能成功。
description.en: Along with other business magnates, made large, high-profile stock purchases in an unsuccessful attempt to stabilize public confidence in the market.

description.zh-cn: 股灾促使美国参议院在1931年成立佩科拉委员会，以调查股灾的成因。
description.en: The crash prompted the U.S. Senate to establish the Pecora Commission in 1931 to investigate its causes.

description.zh-cn: 美国参议院在1931年成立佩科拉委员会，以调查股灾的成因。
description.en: The U.S. Senate founded the Pecora Commission in 1931 to investigate the causes of the crash.

description.zh-cn: 佩科拉委员会的调查工作促成了1933年《格拉斯-斯蒂格尔法案》的通过。
description.en: The work of the Pecora Commission led to the passage of the Glass-Steagall Act in 1933.

description.zh-cn: 股灾发生后，美国政府制定了限价沽空制度以防止投机者在逆市中进一步拖低股市。
description.en: Following the crash, the U.S. government established the Uptick Rule to prevent short sellers from further driving down the market during a downturn.

description.zh-cn: 理查·惠特尼曾担任纽约证券交易所副主席。
description.en: Richard Whitney served as the Vice President of the New York Stock Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民与安娜·施瓦茨合著了《美国货币史》。
description.en: Milton Friedman co-authored 'A Monetary History of the United States' with Anna Schwartz.

description.zh-cn: 安娜·施瓦茨与米尔顿·佛利民合著了《美国货币史》。
description.en: Anna Schwartz co-authored 'A Monetary History of the United States' with Milton Friedman.
